name: CRYPTOPLASM EPHEMERA 03
description: This series of works entitled Ephemera shows the progressive exploration of the CRYPTOPLASM concept.  Crytoplasms are made from physical relics of my constructions. These fragments are recomposed to build an autonomous architectural vocabulary that will be adopted to create complete AR or printed cryptoplasmic architectures. This NFT is registered in the Cryptoplasm Table of Elements.
